title: Bishoujo Mobage: Mobami-chan
synopsis: DeNA promotional anime video for its line of mobile game. The mascot character for the line of games is called Mobami (a combination of "mobile" and "beauty.")
staff: [['Geso, Ikuo', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Digital Paint']], ['Yashima, Sarara', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
